telephony_trunk_external_number_info1: Your SIP trunk offer allows you to display numbers external to the OVHcloud network on your line.
telephony_trunk_external_number_info2: Your number of simultaneous lines allows you to configure up to {{ count }} external numbers.
telephony_trunk_external_number_info2_si: Your number of simultaneous lines allows you to configure up to 1 external number.
telephony_trunk_external_number_info3: Every time an external number is added, it will be automatically validated by phone.
telephony_trunk_external_number_info4: Please also note that mobile phone numbers are not authorised for this functionality.
telephony_trunk_external_number_presente: Delete the external number from the list
telephony_trunk_external_number_add_auto: You are offered auto-validation because you are an OVHcloud partner. By ticking this option, you agree to be the owner of the external number.
telephony_trunk_external_number_add_numb: Please specify an external number in international format (e.g. +44123456789).
The country of the external number must be the same as the trunk line number ({{ prefix }}).
telephony_trunk_external_number_add_vali: The number will be validated in a moment.
When validating, please enter the following code: {{ validationCode }}.
telephony_trunk_external_number_load_err: Oops! An error occurred while loading your external numbers.
telephony_trunk_external_number_delete_s: The external number has been deleted.
telephony_trunk_external_number_add_erro: Oops! An error occurred while adding the external number.
telephony_trunk_external_number_delete_e: Oops! An error occurred while deleting the external number.
